title: Dragon Changes
body:
I think they are good. Now makes him like a little baron as it should be considering how strong the buff is now.

HOWEVER, I think that means champions like Nunu, Warwick and Fiddle, champions who face tanked Dragon to solo it, will be even stronger choice.

Dragon changes are:
Dragon attacks are now treated as targeted spells - which means someone like Vayne can't tumble out of the attack area
Dragon attacks are no longer blockable or dodgeable - they can be spellsheilded and will pop banshees veil
Dragon will ALWAYS finish his attack on the person he has targeted before switching targets - no more juggling aggro

Just saw this...

Smite now works on a charge (or ammo) system. You gain one charge every 75 seconds (vs being able to cast it once every 60 seconds) and can hold up to two charges.

Tool tip now includes: "Smite regains a charge every 75 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges."
Recharge timer starts at 1:40

There is a 15 sec cooldown between casting Smites.

Never miss out on dragon again because you just smited red buff
Oh man that is awesome! I'm psyched for that
